environment.description: Mininum Evaluation Num Policy for TDX Platform

reference.#NOTE: Replace the following configurations based on your own requirements
'min_eval_num' indicates that Platform TCB Reports with higher tcb_eval_num are not required.
The Policy fails if the Platform TCB Report includes an tcb_eval_num which is lower than the value defined in 'min_eval_num'.
If 'min_eval_num' is defined, 'platform_grace_period' and 'collateral_grace_period' must not be defined

environment.description: Mininum Evaluation Num Policy for Verified TDQE

reference.#NOTE: 'min_eval_num' indicates that Platform TCB Reports with higher tcb_eval_num are not required.
The Policy fails if the Platform TCB Report includes an tcb_eval_num which is lower than the value defined in 'min_eval_num'.
If 'min_eval_num' is defined, 'platform_grace_period' and 'collateral_grace_period' must not be defined
